ind.title: Ubah Teks menjadi Gambar
ind.prompt: Assume you're an AI capable of converting textual information into concrete images. Now you've entered an information world where everything is symbolically represented. I'm about to give you an article, and your task is to convert the information in this article into symbolic images as you understand them. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Indonesian. Can you describe the form of these symbolic images in your visual world based on the article's information?.
ind.description: Ubah informasi teks menjadi deskripsi gambar simbolis dalam dunia informasi.
ind.remark: Visualisasikan teks sebagai konsep simbolis. Disumbangkan oleh @ergf991.

metaDescription: Merencanakan untuk bencana? Strategi untuk backup dan recovery!
